review: I met Dr Sujith when i got dengue. He was comfortable from the word Go. He used to be calm when talking each time he came to my room and during the follow up consultation. Every symptom that came up due to the disease and side effect of the medicines were addressed immediately and confidently. I'm glad I got to know of him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

********* *******He listen to the patient carefully & address all query patiently.
Prescribed medication & suggestion helped to recover from the situation.

consulted doc for the first time for my husband and the treatment was very helpful. so when I had issues with my health recently and again the treatment was very effective that I recovered within 2 days and was feeling normal. we never had a family doctor in Bangalore whom we could turn to for any quick guidance but I think we found one now.

Dr. Sujith is really professional and humble. He treated me during my pregnancy. He took care of everything really well. He was always there to help me with any of my concerns at anytime of the day. I would recommend him for sure.
